_comment: Manual address mappings for garbage entries. Format: { 'original_address': { type: 'local'|'intl'|'facility'|'garbage', value: 'COK-xxx' | {country: 'XXX', town: 'YYY'} | 'facilityId' | null } }
_instructions: Go through garbage.json and classify each entry. Update this file as you go, then create a script to merge these mappings into the final outputs.
